game.board

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.board.Board

  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the game board.
    Author:
    Christoph Hermann, Cornelia Sedlmeir-Hofmann

      • isHarbor

        public boolean isHarbor(Corner corner,
                        HarborType type)
        checks if the corner has a Harbor with the HarborType type
        Parameters:
        corner - the corner which we check
        type - the type which the harbor has to have
        Returns:
        true, if the corner has a harbor with the HarborType type. false, otherwise.

      • isHarbor

        public Harbor isHarbor(Corner corner)
        checks if the corner has any Harbor
        Parameters:
        corner - the Corner that is checked for an harbor.
        Returns:
        the harbor, if there is one, else null.
